original_title: VeggieTales: Sing Alongs - I Love My Lips
overview: The VEGGIETALES children's series stars adorable, computer-animated vegetables in family-friendly stories that foster Christian values and morality. This volume finds the animated legumes leading 10 silly songs--including the very catchy "I Love My Lips"--that are tailor-made for karaoke singalongs: just follow the bouncing ball!
title: VeggieTales Sing Alongs: I Love My Lips
